Synopsis

Harry Porter's Diary is horrific fiction. A tale of a man's mounting fear inspired by a sudden appearance of a most horrible reflection in a mirror. Experience Harry Porter's dread and terror, as you read his final diary entries, describing his fading mirror image and the growth of the new image that is guaranteed to have you checking your own miror image twice, just to beHarry Porter's Diary is horrific fiction. A tale of a man's mounting fear inspired by a sudden appearance of a most horrible reflection in a mirror. Experience Harry Porter's dread and terror, as you read his final diary entries, describing his fading mirror image and the growth of the new image that is guaranteed to have you checking your own miror image twice, just to be sure.... If you love horror and suspense, this riveting tale will not disappoint.
